alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:29AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FOR NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTY... At 1128 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chelsea, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pelham, Calera, Chelsea, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Indian Springs Village, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Highland Lakes, Oak Mountain State Park, Fowler Lake, Vandiver, Mount Laurel, Meadowbrook, Sterrett, Ballantrae, Camp Branch and Bounds Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
